content:
att.tableDecoration

provides attributes used to decorate rows or cells of a table. [14 Tables, Formulæ, Graphics, and Notated Music]
Modulefigures — Tables, formulæ, notated music, and figures
Memberscell row
Attributes
@role
indicates the kind of information held in this cell or in each cell of this row.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.enumerated
@rows
indicates the number of rows occupied by this cell or row.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.count
@cols
indicates the number of columns occupied by this cell or row.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.count
